items.sentence: Mary looked in her purse, but she didn\'t find what she was looking for.
Tom and Mary were plotting to kill Tom\'s father for the life insurance.
Tom can\'t explain the difference between cheap wine and expensive wine.
Tom did the best he could, but he still wasn\'t able to pass the course.
Tom didn\'t use to like red wine, but now he drinks it almost every day.
You were always playing tricks on me when we were in junior high school.
Tom doesn\'t understand the difference between confidence and arrogance.
Tom couldn\'t go to Boston with us because he didn\'t have enough money.
I\'m making myself a sandwich. I\'ll make you one, too, if you want one.
I can place the palms of my hands on the floor without bending my knees.
